laboratory_examinations.findings: Positive for antibodies to HTLV-1 using enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay and Western blotting.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Southern blot assay of the skin lesion
laboratory_examinations.findings: Monoclonal integration of HTLV-1 proviral DNA detected.

findings.leukocyte_count: 5.70 x 10^9 L-1 (30% lymphocytes, 0.1% small/medium-sized atypical lymphoid cells)

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Clonal integration of HTLV-1 proviral DNA in the peripheral blood was repeatedly negative.
